author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...IVO WEAKENS TO A TROPICAL DEPRESSION... ...FORECAST TO BECOME A REMNANT LOW ON MONDAY...
summary: ...IVO WEAKENS TO A TROPICAL DEPRESSION... ...FORECAST TO BECOME A REMNANT LOW ON MONDAY... As of 8:00 PM PDT Sun Aug 10 the center of Ivo was located near 22.3, -117.9 with movement WNW at 10 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1006 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 35 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...IVO WEAKENS TO A TROPICAL DEPRESSION... ...FORECAST TO BECOME A REMNANT LOW ON MONDAY... As of 8:00 PM PDT Sun Aug 10 the center of Ivo was located near 22.3, -117.9 with movement WNW at 10 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1006 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 35 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Depression Ivo (EP4/EP092025)
